medical_history.chief_complaint: Primary amenorrhea and absent secondary sexual characteristics.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at the age of 16 years with primary amenorrhea. Physical examination showed no pubic hair and breast development at Tanner stage I. Hormonal evaluation revealed low serum estrogen levels and undetectable basal serum LH and FSH.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Idiopathic hypogonadotropic hypogonadism (IHH) diagnosed after hormonal evaluation and MRI scan of the hypothalamo-pituitary region.
medical_history.family_history: The patientâ€™s parents were second-degree cousins, and two brothers and one sister were affected by complete hypogonadotropic hypogonadism.
